org.openehealth.ipf.commons.flow.purge

Class FlowPurgeJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openehealth.ipf.commons.flow.purge.FlowPurgeJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.Job

    public class FlowPurgeJob
extends Object
implements org.quartz.Job
    A flow purge job implementation used by both, Quartz scheduler and FlowPurgerMBean. The interface to the Quartz scheduler is Job whereas the FlowPurgerMBean uses this class directly for managing jobs and and tracking their status.
    Author:
    Martin Krasser

        public void unschedule()

      • isScheduled

        public boolean isScheduled()
        Returns true is this job is currently scheduled for repeated execution. This method does not return if the job currently as a result of a execute(ApplicationConfig) invocation.
        Returns:
        true if the job is scheduled for repeated execution, false otherwise.
